mapper.insert:
insert into CLOB_TEST (COLUMN1, COLUMN2, COLUMN3, COLUMN4, CLOB_ID, CLOB_VALUE )
(select #{item.column1,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.column2,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.column3,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.column4,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.clobId,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.clobValue,jdbcType=CLOB} from dual )

insert into CLOB_TEST
COLUMN1,
COLUMN2,
COLUMN3,
COLUMN4,
CLOB_ID,
CLOB_VALUE,
#{column1,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{column2,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{column3,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{column4,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{clobId,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{clobValue,jdbcType=CLOB},
mapper.select: select COLUMN1, COLUMN2, COLUMN3, COLUMN4, CLOB_ID from CLOB_TEST where rowNum < 500
select COLUMN1, COLUMN2, COLUMN3, COLUMN4, CLOB_ID from common_info where rowNum < 500
select COLUMN1, COLUMN2, COLUMN3, COLUMN4, CLOB_ID, CLOB_VALUE from CLOB_TEST where rowNum < 500
select t.COLUMN1, t.COLUMN2, t.COLUMN3, t.COLUMN4, t.CLOB_ID, v.CLOB_VALUE from common_info t left join COMMON_INFO_VALUE v on t.CLOB_ID = v.CLOB_ID where rowNum < 500
